p:
To determine solubility, samples (2 × 2 cm) were dried at 105 °C (24 h) and transferred to beakers with 50 mL of distilled water, submitted to shaking (100 rpm) in a Shaker incubator (Marconi, MA 420, Piracicaba, Brazil) for 24 h [ 35]. Subsequently, the samples were again oven dried (Fanem, 515, Sao Paulo, Brazil) at 105 °C for 24 h and the soluble material was determined according to Equation (2):
(2)
S o l u b i l i t y
( % )
=
(
m i
−
m f
m i
)
where:
m i
is the (g) sample initial dry mass and
m f
is the (g) sample final dry mass.
